df-covers
blocks.content: Define the covers relation ("is covered by") for posets. " ` a ` is covered by ` b ` " means that ` a ` is strictly less than ` b ` and there is nothing in between. See ~ cvrval for the relation form. (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-covers(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccvr, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cplt, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), wn(wrex(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cplt, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cplt, cv(s0)), cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-covers(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ <o =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { < s1, s2 > |((s1 ∈(Base ` s0)∧ s2 ∈(Base ` s0))∧ s1[(lt ` s0)]s2 ∧ ¬ ∃(s3 ∈(Base ` s0),(s1[(lt ` s0)]s3 ∧ s3[(lt ` s0)]s2)))})
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
}

thm cvrfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccvr, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))))), diffsc(s2, c3))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))), cfv(ccvr, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, ccvr, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))), copab(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))))))
  opabbidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))), w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  breqd(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))
  rexeqbidv(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))
  breqd(cv(s0), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s2), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  breqd(cv(s2), cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplt, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cplt, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplt)
  df-covers(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  eqeltri(copab(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))), universe, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))))
  3anass(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))
  ssexi(copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))), cxp(c3, c3))
  xpex(c3, c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c3, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c3, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm cvrfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))})
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(lt ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(<o ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))}), d(s2, c3))
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))}, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))}, (<o ` c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, ccvr, { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))}, { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(Base ` hs0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` hs0))∧ s0[(lt ` hs0)]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0[(lt ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s2[(lt ` hs0)]s1)))})
  opabbidv(s0, s1, hs0 = c0, ((s0 ∈(Base ` hs0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` hs0))∧ s0[(lt ` hs0)]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0[(lt ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s2[(lt ` hs0)]s1))), ((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1))))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, (s0 ∈(Base ` hs0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` hs0)), s0[(lt ` hs0)]s1, ¬ ∃(s2 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0[(lt ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s2[(lt ` hs0)]s1)), (s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3), s0[c4]s1, ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0 ∈(Base ` hs0), s1 ∈(Base ` hs0), s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3)
  eleq2d(s0, (Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  eleq2d(s1, (Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  breqd(s0, (lt ` hs0), s1, c4, hs0 = c0)
  notbid(hs0 = c0, ∃(s2 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0[(lt ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s2[(lt ` hs0)]s1)), ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))
  rexeqbidv(s2, (Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0, (s0[(lt ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s2[(lt ` hs0)]s1), (s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c3, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0[(lt ` hs0)]s2, s2[(lt ` hs0)]s1, s0[c4]s2, s2[c4]s1)
  breqd(s0, (lt ` hs0), s2, c4, hs0 = c0)
  breqd(s2, (lt ` hs0), s1, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((lt ` hs0), c4, (lt ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplt)
  df-covers(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  eqeltri({ < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))}, universe, { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧(s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1))))})
  opabbii(s0, s1, ((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1))), ((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧(s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))))
  3anass((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3), s0[c4]s1, ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))
  ssexi({ < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧(s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1))))}, (c3 × c3))
  xpex(c3, c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c3, c3, (s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c({ < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ s0[c4]s1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s2 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c4]s1)))})
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: cvrval
blocks.content: Binary relation expressing ` B ` covers ` A ` , which means that ` B ` is larger than ` A ` and there is nothing in between. Definition 3.2.18 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68. ( ~ cvbr analog.) (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvrval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wb(wbr(c2, c5, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c6, c4), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c4)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplt, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccvr, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wbr(c2, c5, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c6, c4), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c4))))), wbr(c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs1)))))))), c4))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wb(wbr(c2, c5, c4), wbr(c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs1)))))))), c4)))
  breqd(c2, c5, c4, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs1)))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl6eq(c5, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs1)))))))), copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  cvrfval(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, c5, c3, c6)
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs1))))))))
  3anass(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c6, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(hs1))))))

blocks.name: cvrlt
blocks.content: The covers relation implies the less-than relation. ( ~ cvpss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: cvrnbtwn
blocks.content: There is no element between the two arguments of the covers relation. ( ~ cvnbtwn analog.) (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvrnbtwn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c5, c3)), wbr(c2, c6, c4)), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cplt, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ccvr, c0))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c5, c3)), wbr(c2, c6, c4), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c5, c3))), wbr(c2, c6, c4), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4))), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wrex(hs0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4))))))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c5, c3), wb(wbr(c2, c6, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wrex(hs0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4)))))))
  cvrval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, c7)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c5, c3)), wi(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wrex(hs0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4))))), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4)))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c5, c3), wi(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wrex(hs0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4))))), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4)))))
  adantld(wcel(c5, c3), wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wrex(hs0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4)))), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4))))
  syl5bir(wcel(c5, c3), wn(wrex(hs0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4)))), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4))), wral(hs0, c3, wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4)))))
  ralnex(hs0, c3, wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4)))
  rspcv(hs0, c5, c3, wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4))), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wa(wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4)), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wbr(c2, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c4), wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c5, c2, c7)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c5, c7, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wa(wbr(c2, c7, c5), wbr(c5, c7, c4))))

blocks.pretty:
thm cvrnbtwn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c3 ∧ c5 ∈ c3)∧ c2[c6]c4)→ ¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(lt ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(<o ` c0)
} = {
  3impia(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c3 ∧ c5 ∈ c3), c2[c6]c4, ¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4))
  sylbid((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c3 ∧ c5 ∈ c3)), c2[c6]c4, ¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4), (c2[c7]c4 ∧ ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ c3,(c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4))))
  3adant3r3(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c3, c5 ∈ c3, (c2[c6]c4 ↔(c2[c7]c4 ∧ ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ c3,(c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4)))))
  cvrval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, c7)
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c3 ∧ c5 ∈ c3), ((c2[c7]c4 ∧ ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ c3,(c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4)))→ ¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4)))
  3ad2ant3(c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c3, c5 ∈ c3, ((c2[c7]c4 ∧ ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ c3,(c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4)))→ ¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4)))
  adantld(c5 ∈ c3, c2[c7]c4, ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ c3,(c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4)), ¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4))
  syl5bir(c5 ∈ c3, ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ c3,(c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4)), ¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4), ∀(hs0 ∈ c3, ¬(c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4)))
  ralnex(hs0, c3, (c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4))
  rspcv(hs0, c5, c3, ¬(c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4), ¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4))
  notbid(hs0 = c5, (c2[c7]hs0 ∧ hs0[c7]c4), (c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c5, c2[c7]hs0, hs0[c7]c4, c2[c7]c5, c5[c7]c4)
  breq2(hs0, c5, c2, c7)
  breq1(hs0, c5, c7, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(¬(c2[c7]c5 ∧ c5[c7]c4))
}

blocks.name: ncvr1
blocks.content: No element covers the lattice unit. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ncvr1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wn(wbr(c3, c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cp1, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccvr, c0))
} = {
  mtand(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c4, c1), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1))
  mt2d(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3))
  ople1(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cple, c0), c3)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wn(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)))
  syl31anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1)), wn(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wcel(c0, cpo))
  opposet(c0)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1))
  pltnle(c0, c3, c2, c1, cfv(cplt, c0), cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  syl31anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c4, c1)), wbr(c3, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, c4, c1))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, c4, c1))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, c4, c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  op1cl(c0, c3, c2)
  simplr(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, c4, c1))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c4, c1))
  cvrlt(c0, cops, c3, c2, c1, c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplt, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ncvr1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ OP ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ ¬ c3[c4]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(1. ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(<o ` c0)
} = {
  mtand((c0 ∈ OP ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3[c4]c1, c3[(lt ` c0)]c1)
  mt2d((c0 ∈ OP ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3[(lt ` c0)]c1, c1[(le ` c0)]c3)
  ople1(c0, c1, c2, (le ` c0), c3)
  ex((c0 ∈ OP ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3[(lt ` c0)]c1, ¬ c1[(le ` c0)]c3)
  syl31anc(((c0 ∈ OP ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ c3[(lt ` c0)]c1), ¬ c1[(le ` c0)]c3, c0 ∈ Poset, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, c3[(lt ` c0)]c1)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ OP, c1 ∈ c2, c3[(lt ` c0)]c1, c0 ∈ Poset)
  opposet(c0)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ OP, c1 ∈ c2, c3[(lt ` c0)]c1, c3 ∈ c2)
  simplr(c0 ∈ OP, c1 ∈ c2, c3[(lt ` c0)]c1)
  simpr((c0 ∈ OP ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3[(lt ` c0)]c1)
  pltnle(c0, c3, c2, c1, (lt ` c0), (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  syl31anc(((c0 ∈ OP ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ c3[c4]c1), c3[(lt ` c0)]c1, c0 ∈ OP, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, c3[c4]c1)
  simpll(c0 ∈ OP, c1 ∈ c2, c3[c4]c1)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ OP, c1 ∈ c2, c3[c4]c1, c3 ∈ c2)
  op1cl(c0, c3, c2)
  simplr(c0 ∈ OP, c1 ∈ c2, c3[c4]c1)
  simpr((c0 ∈ OP ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3[c4]c1)
  cvrlt(c0, cops, c3, c2, c1, c4, (lt ` c0))
  eqid((lt ` c0))
}

blocks.name: cvrletrN
blocks.content: Property of an element above a covering. (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvrletrN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c6, c4)), wbr(c1, c7, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cplt, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccvr, c0))
} = {
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c6, c4), wbr(c1, c7, c4))
  mpand(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wbr(c3, c6, c4), wbr(c1, c7, c4), wbr(c1, c7, c3))
  syl31anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wbr(c1, c7, c3), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wbr(c1, c5, c3))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3))
  simplr1(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(c1, c5, c3))
  simplr2(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(c1, c5, c3))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3))
  cvrlt(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c5, c7)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c7, c3), wbr(c3, c6, c4)), wbr(c1, c7, c4)))
  pltletr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c7, c6)
}

thm cvrletrN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→((c1[c5]c3 ∧ c3[c6]c4)→ c1[c7]c4))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(lt ` c0)

thm cvrnbtwn3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3)→((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3)↔ c1 = c4))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(lt ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(<o ` c0)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), (c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3), c1 = c4)
  mpbid((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), ((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3)→ c1 = c4), ¬(c1[c7]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3))
  cvrnbtwn(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7)
  syl6bb((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), ¬(c1[c7]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3), ((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3)→ c1 = c4), ¬((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4)∧ c4[c7]c3))
  notbid((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), (c1[c7]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3), ((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4)∧ c4[c7]c3))
  anbi1d((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), c1[c7]c4, c4[c7]c3, (c1[c6]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Poset, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3, (c1[c7]c4 ↔(c1[c6]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4)))
  3adant3r2(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1[c7]c4 ↔(c1[c6]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4)))
  pltval(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c4, c2, c7, c6)
  bitr4i(¬((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4)∧ c4[c7]c3), ((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3)→ c1 = c4), ¬((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3)∧ ¬ c1 = c4))
  notbii(((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4)∧ c4[c7]c3), ((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3)∧ ¬ c1 = c4))
  bitri(((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4)∧ c4[c7]c3), ((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3)∧ ¬ c1 = c4), ((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3)∧ c1 ≠ c4))
  an32(c1[c6]c4, c1 ≠ c4, c4[c7]c3)
  anbi2i((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3), c1 ≠ c4, ¬ c1 = c4)
  df-ne(c1, c4)
  iman((c1[c6]c4 ∧ c4[c7]c3), c1 = c4)
  jcad((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), c1 = c4, c1[c6]c4, c4[c7]c3)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Poset, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3, (c1 = c4 → c1[c6]c4))
  3ad2antr1(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1 = c4 → c1[c6]c4))
  syl5ibcom((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1 = c4, c1[c6]c4, c1[c6]c1)
  posref(c0, c1, c2, c6)
  breq2(c1, c4, c1, c6)
  syl5ibcom((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), c1 = c4, c4[c7]c3, c1[c7]c3)
  syl31anc((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), c1[c7]c3, c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1[c5]c3)
  simp1(c0 ∈ Poset, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3)
  simp21(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, c1[c5]c3)
  simp22(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, c1[c5]c3)
  simp3(c0 ∈ Poset, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3)
  cvrlt(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c5, c7)
  breq1(c1, c4, c7, c3)
}

blocks.name: cvrnle
blocks.content: The covers relation implies the negation of the converse "less than or equal to" relation. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: cvrne
blocks.content: The covers relation implies inequality. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: cvrnrefN
blocks.content: The covers relation is not reflexive. ( ~ cvnref analog.) (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvrnrefN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wbr(c2, c4, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccvr, c0))
} = {
  mpi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wbr(c2, c4, c2)), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  necon2bd(c2, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c2, c4, c2))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c2, c4, c2), wne(c2, c2))
  syl31anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c2, c4, c2)), wne(c2, c2), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c2, c4, c2))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c2, c4, c2))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c2, c4, c2))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c2, c4, c2))
  cvrne(c0, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cvrnrefN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ ¬ c2[c4]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(<o ` c0)
} = {
  mpi((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), ¬ c2[c4]c2, c2 = c2)
  eqid(c2)
  necon2bd(c2, c2, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c2[c4]c2)
  ex((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c2[c4]c2, c2 ≠ c2)
  syl31anc(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ c2[c4]c2), c2 ≠ c2, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3, c2[c4]c2)
  simpll(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c2[c4]c2)
  simplr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c2[c4]c2)
  simpr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c2[c4]c2)
  cvrne(c0, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4)
}

blocks.name: cvrcmp
blocks.content: If two lattice elements that cover a third are comparable, then they are equal. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvrcmp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wb(wbr(c1, c6, c3), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccvr, c0))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wbr(c1, c6, c3), wceq(c1, c3))

  mpd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wbr(c1, c6, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wne(c4, c1))
  syl31anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wbr(c1, c6, c3)), wne(c4, c1), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c4, c5, c1))
  cvrne(c0, cpo, c4, c2, c1, c5)
  sylib(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wbr(c1, c6, c3)), wi(wne(c4, c1), wceq(c1, c3)), wo(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c1, c3)))
  mpbi2and(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wbr(c1, c6, c3)), wo(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c1, c3)), wbr(c4, c6, c1), wbr(c1, c6, c3))
  syl31anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wbr(c1, c6, c3)), wbr(c4, c6, c1), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c4, c5, c1))
  simpl3l(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3), wbr(c1, c6, c3))
  cvrle(c0, cpo, c4, c2, c1, c5, c6)
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wbr(c1, c6, c3))
  syl131anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3))), wbr(c1, c6, c3)), wb(wa(wbr(c4, c6, c1), wbr(c1, c6, c3)), wo(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c1, c3))), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c4, c5, c3))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3)), wbr(c1, c6, c3))
  simpl23(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3)), wbr(c1, c6, c3))
  simpl22(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3)), wbr(c1, c6, c3))
  simpl21(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wa(wbr(c4, c5, c1), wbr(c4, c5, c3)), wbr(c1, c6, c3))

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)∧(c4[c5]c1 ∧ c4[c5]c3))→(c1[c6]c3 ↔ c1 = c3))

blocks.name: pats
blocks.content: The set of atoms in a poset. (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pats(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, c3, wbr(c4, c5, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccvr, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, c3, wbr(c4, c5, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, crab(s0, c3, wbr(c4, c5, cv(s0))), cfv(catm, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, catm, crab(s0, c3, wbr(c4, c5, cv(s0))), crab(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccvr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccvr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), wbr(c4, c5, cv(s0)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccvr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), wbr(c4, c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), c5, cv(s0)))
  breqd(cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccvr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ccvr, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(ccvr, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccvr)
  breq1d(cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), c5, cv(s0), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cp0, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cp0)
  df-ats(hs0, s0)
  rabex(s0, c3, wbr(c4, c5, cv(s0)))
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, c3, wbr(c4, c5, cv(s0))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, cv(hs0))
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm pats(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 = { s0 ∈ c3 | c4[c5]s0 })
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(0. ` c0)

} = {

  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, catm, { s0 ∈ c3 | c4[c5]s0 }, { s0 ∈(Base ` hs0)|(0. ` hs0)[(<o ` hs0)]s0 })
  rabeqbidv(s0, (Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0, (0. ` hs0)[(<o ` hs0)]s0, c4[c5]s0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c3, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  bitrd(hs0 = c0, (0. ` hs0)[(<o ` hs0)]s0, c4[c5]s0, (0. ` hs0)[c5]s0)

  syl6eqr((<o ` hs0), c5, (<o ` c0), hs0 = c0)

  breq1d((0. ` hs0), c5, s0, c4, hs0 = c0)

  fveq2(hs0, c0, cp0)

  rabex(s0, c3, c4[c5]s0)

  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ c3 | c4[c5]s0 })
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, hs0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)

thm isat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wbr(c5, c6, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ccvr, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(catm, c0))
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wbr(c5, c6, c2)), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, c4, wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)))))
  eleq2d(c2, c3, crab(hs0, c4, wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  pats(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  elrab(hs0, c2, c4, wbr(c5, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(c5, c6, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c5, c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c5, c6, c2))
}

thm isat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ∈ c3 ↔(c2 ∈ c4 ∧ c5[c6]c2)))

  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cal), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cal), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, cal), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0))))))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cal, clat, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cdm(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)))), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cfv(cp0, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, cfv(catm, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cdm(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)))), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cfv(cp0, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, cfv(catm, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0))))))
  eleq12d(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cdm(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0))), c1, cdm(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cglb, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cglb)
  raleqbidv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wne(cv(s0), cfv(cp0, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, cfv(catm, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(s0), cfv(cp0, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, cfv(catm, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0))))
  neeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cp0, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cp0, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cp0)
  rexeqbidv(s1, cfv(catm, cv(hs0)), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(catm, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(catm, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, catm)
  breqd(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(cple, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cple)
  df-atl(hs0, s0, s1)
  3anass(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(clat)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isatl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ AtLat ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0)))))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(glb ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0. ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Atoms ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ AtLat ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0))))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ AtLat ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0))))), d(s1, c4))
  bitr4i(c0 ∈ AtLat, (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0)))), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ dom(c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0))))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cal, clat, (c1 ∈ dom(c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0)))), ((Base ` hs0)∈ dom((glb ` hs0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0 ≠(0. ` hs0)→ ∃(s1 ∈(Atoms ` hs0), s1[(le ` hs0)]s0)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (Base ` hs0)∈ dom((glb ` hs0)), ∀(s0 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0 ≠(0. ` hs0)→ ∃(s1 ∈(Atoms ` hs0), s1[(le ` hs0)]s0))), c1 ∈ dom(c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0))))
  eleq12d((Base ` hs0), dom((glb ` hs0)), c1, dom(c2), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd((glb ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((glb ` hs0), c2, (glb ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cglb)
  raleqbidv(s0, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, (s0 ≠(0. ` hs0)→ ∃(s1 ∈(Atoms ` hs0), s1[(le ` hs0)]s0)), (s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0)))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0 ≠(0. ` hs0), ∃(s1 ∈(Atoms ` hs0), s1[(le ` hs0)]s0), s0 ≠ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0))
  neeq2d(s0, (0. ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((0. ` hs0), c3, (0. ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cp0)
  rexeqbidv(s1, (Atoms ` hs0), c4, hs0 = c0, s1[(le ` hs0)]s0, s1[c5]s0)
  syl6eqr((Atoms ` hs0), c4, (Atoms ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, catm)
  breqd(s1, (le ` hs0), s0, c5, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((le ` hs0), c5, (le ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cple)
  df-atl(hs0, s0, s1)
  3anass(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ dom(c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(clat)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ∈ dom(c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c5]s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: atllat
blocks.content: An atomic lattice is a lattice. (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm atllat(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c0, clat))
} = {
  simp1bi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cdm(cfv(cglb, c0))), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wi(wne(cv(hs0), cfv(cp0, c0)), wrex(hs1, cfv(catm, c0), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))))))
  isatl(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(catm, c0), cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cp0, c0))
  eqid(cfv(catm, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(catm, c0))
}

thm atllat(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c0 ∈ Lat)
} = {
  simp1bi(c0 ∈ AtLat, c0 ∈ Lat, (Base ` c0)∈ dom((glb ` c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0),(hs0 ≠(0. ` c0)→ ∃(hs1 ∈(Atoms ` c0), hs1[(le ` c0)]hs0))))
  isatl(hs0, hs1, c0, (Base ` c0), (glb ` c0), (0. ` c0), (Atoms ` c0), (le ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((glb ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  eqid((0. ` c0))
  eqid((Atoms ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Atoms ` c0))
}

blocks.name: atlpos
blocks.content: An atomic lattice is a poset. (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)

blocks.name: atl0dm
blocks.content: Condition necessary for zero element to exist. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm atl0dm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cglb, c0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(club, c0)))
  simp2bi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wcel(c0, clat), wral(hs0, c1, wi(wne(cv(hs0), cfv(cp0, c0)), wrex(hs1, cfv(catm, c0), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))))))
  isatl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(catm, c0), cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cp0, c0))
  eqid(cfv(catm, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(catm, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atl0dm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ AtLat → c1 ∈ dom(c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(lub ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(glb ` c0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ AtLat → c1 ∈ dom(c2)), c3 =(lub ` c0))
  simp2bi(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ dom(c2), c0 ∈ Lat, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(hs0 ≠(0. ` c0)→ ∃(hs1 ∈(Atoms ` c0), hs1[(le ` c0)]hs0))))
  isatl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, (0. ` c0), (Atoms ` c0), (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  eqid((0. ` c0))
  eqid((Atoms ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Atoms ` c0))
}

blocks.name: atl0cl
blocks.content: An atomic lattice has a zero element. We can use this in place of ~ op0cl for lattices without orthocomplements. (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)

blocks.name: atl0le
blocks.content: Orthoposet zero is less than or equal to any element. ( ~ ch0le analog.) (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm atl0le(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c4, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cp0, c0))
} = {
  p0le(c3, c4, c1, c2, c0, cfv(cglb, c0), cal, wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cglb, c0))))
  atl0dm(c0, c2, cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(club, c0))
  eqid(cfv(club, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atl0le(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3[c4]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0. ` c0)
} = {
  p0le(c3, c4, c1, c2, c0, (glb ` c0), cal, (c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  simpl(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ∈ dom((glb ` c0)))
  atl0dm(c0, c2, (glb ` c0), (lub ` c0))
  eqid((lub ` c0))
  eqid((glb ` c0))
}

blocks.name: atlle0
blocks.content: An element less than or equal to zero equals zero. ( ~ chle0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm atlle0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, c3, c4), wceq(c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cp0, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c4), wceq(c1, c4), wa(wbr(c1, c3, c4), wbr(c4, c3, c1)))
  biantrud(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c4), wbr(c4, c3, c1))
  atl0le(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wa(wbr(c1, c3, c4), wbr(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(c1, c4)), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cpo))
  atlpos(c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  atl0cl(c0, c4, c2)
  posasymb(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atlle0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c1[c3]c4 ↔ c1 = c4))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(0. ` c0)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1[c3]c4, c1 = c4, (c1[c3]c4 ∧ c4[c3]c1))
  biantrud((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1[c3]c4, c4[c3]c1)
  atl0le(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ((c1[c3]c4 ∧ c4[c3]c1)↔ c1 = c4), c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ Poset)
  atlpos(c0)
  simpr(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  atl0cl(c0, c4, c2)
  posasymb(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: atlltn0
blocks.content: A lattice element greater than zero is nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm atlltn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c3, c4, c1), wne(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cp0, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c4, c1), wne(c1, c3), wa(wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wne(c3, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c3, c4, c1), wa(wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wne(c3, c1))), wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  atl0cl(c0, c3, c2)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2))
  pltval(c0, cal, c3, c2, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  syl5rbb(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wne(c3, c1)), wne(c1, c3), wne(c3, c1))
  necom(c1, c3)
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wne(c3, c1), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1))
  atl0le(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atlltn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3[c4]c1 ↔ c1 ≠ c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(lt ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0. ` c0)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3[c4]c1, c1 ≠ c3, (c3[(le ` c0)]c1 ∧ c3 ≠ c1))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c3[c4]c1 ↔(c3[(le ` c0)]c1 ∧ c3 ≠ c1)), c0 ∈ AtLat, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  atl0cl(c0, c3, c2)
  simpr(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2)
  pltval(c0, cal, c3, c2, c1, c2, c4, (le ` c0))
  syl5rbb((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c3[(le ` c0)]c1 ∧ c3 ≠ c1), c1 ≠ c3, c3 ≠ c1)
  necom(c1, c3)
  biantrurd((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3 ≠ c1, c3[(le ` c0)]c1)
  atl0le(c0, c1, c2, c3, (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
}

blocks.name: isat3
blocks.content: The predicate "is an atom". ( ~ elat2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2014.)

thm isat3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cal), wb(wcel(c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c1, c3), wne(c1, c4), wral(s0, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c1, c3), wne(c1, c4), wral(s0, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))))), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wa(wne(c1, c4), wral(s0, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))))))
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wa(wne(c1, c4), wral(s0, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))))), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wbr(c4, cfv(ccvr, c0), c1)))
  isat(c0, cal, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(ccvr, c0))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3), wa(wne(c1, c4), wral(s0, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))))), wbr(c4, cfv(ccvr, c0), c1))
  bitr2d(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3)), wa(wne(c1, c4), wral(s0, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))))), wbr(c4, cfv(ccvr, c0), c1), wa(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wral(s0, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3)), wb(wbr(c4, cfv(ccvr, c0), c1), wa(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wral(s0, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))), wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c1, c3))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c4, c3))
  atl0cl(c0, c4, c3)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3))
  cvrval2(s0, c0, cal, c4, c3, c1, cfv(ccvr, c0), cfv(cplt, c0), c5)
  eqid(cfv(ccvr, c0))
  anbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3)), wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wral(s0, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wne(c1, c4), wral(s0, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))))
  atlltn0(c0, c1, c3, c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
  ralbidva(s0, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3)), wi(wa(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))))
  3bitr4g(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wi(wa(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wi(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wi(wne(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  imbi2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wi(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wne(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  imbi1d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c4))

  impexp(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  bi2.04(wbr(c4, cfv(cplt, c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  imbi2i(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wi(wne(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  bitri(wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wi(wne(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  orcom(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))
  neor(cv(s0), c4, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  3anass(wcel(c1, c3), wne(c1, c4), wral(s0, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cal)
  diff.cal.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c3)

blocks.name: atn0
blocks.content: An atom is not zero. ( ~ atne0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm atn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3))
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wne(c1, c3), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), c1), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  isat3(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  simp2(wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wne(c1, c3), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), c1), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm atn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1 ≠ c3)
  ⊣ c3 =(0. ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Atoms ` c0)
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ≠ c3)
  syl6bi(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ≠ c3, (c1 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ c3 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0),(hs0[(le ` c0)]c1 →(hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c3)))))
  isat3(hs0, c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c0), c3, (le ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  simp2(c1 ∈(Base ` c0), c1 ≠ c3, ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0),(hs0[(le ` c0)]c1 →(hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c3))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: atnle0
blocks.content: An atom is not less than or equal to zero. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm atnle0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wn(wbr(c1, c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
} = {
  syl31anc(wa(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2)), wn(wbr(c1, c3, c4)), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wbr(c4, cfv(ccvr, c0), c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cpo))
  atlpos(c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  atl0cl(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  atbase(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  atcvr0(c0, cal, c1, c2, c4, cfv(ccvr, c0))
  cvrnle(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c0), c1, cfv(ccvr, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ccvr, c0))
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ ¬ c1[c3]c4)

blocks.name: atlen0
blocks.content: A lattice element is nonzero if an atom is under it. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm atlen0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wne(c1, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(catm, c0))
} = {
  necomd(c1, c6, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  sylc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wne(c6, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c6, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c6, cfv(cplt, c0), c1))
  3jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c6, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  mp2and(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wbr(c6, cfv(cplt, c0), c1), wbr(c6, cfv(cplt, c0), c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  syl31anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wbr(c6, cfv(cplt, c0), c3), wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c6, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wbr(c6, cfv(ccvr, c0), c3))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wbr(c6, cfv(ccvr, c0), c3), wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c3, c4))
  atcvr0(c0, cal, c3, c4, c6, cfv(ccvr, c0))
  cvrlt(c0, cal, c6, c2, c3, cfv(ccvr, c0), cfv(cplt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ccvr, c0))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  syl13anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wi(wa(wbr(c6, cfv(cplt, c0), c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wbr(c6, cfv(cplt, c0), c1)), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c6, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c0, cal))
  atlpos(c0)
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wcel(c6, c2), wcel(c0, cal))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  atl0cl(c0, c6, c2)
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  atbase(c3, c4, c2, c0)
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  pltletr(c0, c6, c2, c3, c1, cfv(cplt, c0), c5)
  pltne(c0, cal, c6, c2, c1, c2, cfv(cplt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplt, c0))

thm atlen0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1)→ c1 ≠ c6)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(0. ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Atoms ` c0)
} = {
  necomd(c1, c6, ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1))
  sylc(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), c6 ≠ c1, (c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c6 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c6[(lt ` c0)]c1)
  3jca(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), c0 ∈ AtLat, c6 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  mp2and(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), c6[(lt ` c0)]c1, c6[(lt ` c0)]c3, c3[c5]c1)
  syl31anc(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), c6[(lt ` c0)]c3, c0 ∈ AtLat, c6 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c6[(<o ` c0)]c3)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), c6[(<o ` c0)]c3, c0 ∈ AtLat, c3 ∈ c4)
  atcvr0(c0, cal, c3, c4, c6, (<o ` c0))
  cvrlt(c0, cal, c6, c2, c3, (<o ` c0), (lt ` c0))
  eqid((<o ` c0))
  simpr((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), c3[c5]c1)
  syl13anc(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), ((c6[(lt ` c0)]c3 ∧ c3[c5]c1)→ c6[(lt ` c0)]c1), c0 ∈ Poset, c6 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  syl(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), c0 ∈ Poset, c0 ∈ AtLat)
  atlpos(c0)
  syl(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), c6 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ AtLat)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, c3[c5]c1)
  atl0cl(c0, c6, c2)
  syl(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ c3[c5]c1), c3 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  simpl3(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, c3[c5]c1)
  atbase(c3, c4, c2, c0)
  simpl2(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, c3[c5]c1)
  pltletr(c0, c6, c2, c3, c1, (lt ` c0), c5)
  pltne(c0, cal, c6, c2, c1, c2, (lt ` c0))
  eqid((lt ` c0))

blocks.name: atcmp
blocks.content: If two atoms are comparable, they are equal. ( ~ atsseq analog.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm atcmp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
} = {
  syl132anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wbr(cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(ccvr, c0), c1), wbr(cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(ccvr, c0), c3))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cpo))
  atlpos(c0)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  atbase(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  atbase(c3, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  atl0cl(c0, cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wbr(cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(ccvr, c0), c1))
  atcvr0(c0, cal, c1, c2, cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(ccvr, c0))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wbr(cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(ccvr, c0), c3))
  atcvr0(c0, cal, c3, c2, cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(ccvr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cp0, c0))
  cvrcmp(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c3, cfv(cp0, c0), cfv(ccvr, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ccvr, c0))
}

  adantr((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), c1[c5]c3, c0 ∈ Poset)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, c0 ∈ Poset)

blocks.name: atlex
blocks.content: Every nonzero element of an atomic lattice is greater than or equal to an atom. ( ~ hatomic analog.) (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm atlex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(catm, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  3imp(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cal), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wi(wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)))), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wne(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, cv(hs0))))))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, cal), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wne(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cglb, c0))))
  isatl(hs0, s0, c0, c2, cfv(cglb, c0), c3, c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c0))
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c1, wi(wne(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, cv(hs0)))), wi(wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, cv(hs0))), wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)))
  neeq1(cv(hs0), c1, c3)
  rexbidv(s0, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c5, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0), c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atlex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0. ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Atoms ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  3imp(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ≠ c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]c1))
  syl(c0 ∈ AtLat, (c1 ∈ c2 →(c1 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]c1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(hs0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]hs0))))
  simp3bi(c0 ∈ AtLat, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(hs0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]hs0))), c0 ∈ Lat, c2 ∈ dom((glb ` c0)))
  isatl(hs0, s0, c0, c2, (glb ` c0), c3, c4, c5)
  eqid((glb ` c0))
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c1, (hs0 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]hs0)), (c1 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]c1)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ≠ c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]hs0), c1 ≠ c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]c1))
  neeq1(hs0, c1, c3)
  rexbidv(s0, c4, hs0 = c1, s0[c5]hs0, s0[c5]c1)
  breq2(hs0, c1, s0, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c4, s0[c5]c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: atnle
blocks.content: Two ways of expressing "an atom is not less than or equal to a lattice element." ( ~ atnssm0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm atnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wb(wn(wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wceq(co(c1, c6, c3), c7)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmee, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
} = {

thm atnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→(¬ c1[c5]c3 ↔(c1[c6]c3)= c7))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(meet ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(0. ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Atoms ` c0)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), ¬ c1[c5]c3, (c1[c6]c3)= c7)
  necon1bd((c1[c6]c3), c7, (c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), c1[c5]c3)
  ex((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)≠ c7, c1[c5]c3)
  mpd(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧(c1[c6]c3)≠ c7), c1[c5]c3, ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0[c5](c1[c6]c3)))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧(c1[c6]c3)≠ c7), ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0[c5](c1[c6]c3)), c0 ∈ AtLat, (c1[c6]c3)∈ c4, (c1[c6]c3)≠ c7)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, (c1[c6]c3)≠ c7)
  adantr((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)≠ c7, (c1[c6]c3)∈ c4)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)∈ c4, c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c4)
  latmcl(c0, c1, c4, c3, c6)
  simpr((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)≠ c7)
  atlex(hs0, c0, (c1[c6]c3), c4, c7, c2, c5)
  rexlimdva(hs0, c2, ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧(c1[c6]c3)≠ c7), hs0[c5](c1[c6]c3), c1[c5]c3)
  adantlr((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)≠ c7, hs0 ∈ c2, (hs0[c5](c1[c6]c3)→ c1[c5]c3))
  sylbird(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), hs0[c5](c1[c6]c3), c1[c5]c3, (hs0[c5]c1 ∧ hs0[c5]c3))
  syl13anc(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ((hs0[c5]c1 ∧ hs0[c5]c3)↔ hs0[c5](c1[c6]c3)), c0 ∈ Lat, hs0 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c4)
  syl(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Lat, c0 ∈ AtLat)
  adantl((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c4)
  atbase(hs0, c2, c4, c0)
  syl(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), c1 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpl3(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, hs0 ∈ c2)
  latlem12(c0, hs0, c4, c1, c3, c5, c6)
  impd(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), hs0[c5]c1, hs0[c5]c3, c1[c5]c3)
  syl6bi(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), hs0[c5]c1, (hs0[c5]c3 → c1[c5]c3), hs0 = c1)
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0[c5]c1 ↔ hs0 = c1), c0 ∈ AtLat, hs0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, hs0 ∈ c2)
  simpr((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), hs0 ∈ c2)
  simpl2(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, hs0 ∈ c2)
  atcmp(c0, hs0, c2, c1, c5)
  biimpd(hs0 = c1, hs0[c5]c3, c1[c5]c3)
  breq1(hs0, c1, c5, c3)
  mpid((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)= c7, ¬ c1[c5]c3, c1 ≠ c7)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, c1 ≠ c7)
  atn0(c0, c1, c2, c7)
  ex((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)= c7, (c1 ≠ c7 → ¬ c1[c5]c3))
  necon3ad(c1, c7, ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧(c1[c6]c3)= c7), c1[c5]c3)
  sylbid(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧(c1[c6]c3)= c7), c1[c5]c3, c1 = c7, (c1[c6]c3)= c1)
  adantr((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)= c7, (c1[c5]c3 ↔(c1[c6]c3)= c1))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c5]c3 ↔(c1[c6]c3)= c1), c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c4)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, c0 ∈ Lat)
  atllat(c0)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ c4)
  atbase(c1, c2, c4, c0)
  simp3(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  latleeqm1(c0, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6)
  adantl((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c1[c6]c3)= c7, ((c1[c6]c3)= c1 → c1 = c7))
  biimpcd((c1[c6]c3)= c7, (c1[c6]c3)= c1, c1 = c7)
  eqeq1((c1[c6]c3), c1, c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[c6]c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧(c1[c6]c3)≠ c7))
  diff.hs0.w(c1[c5]c3)
}

blocks.name: atnem0
blocks.content: The meet of distinct atoms is zero. ( ~ atnemeq0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm atnem0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wne(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmee, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cp0, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
} = {
  bitr3d(w3a(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wne(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5), wn(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)))
  atncmp(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  syl3an3(wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wb(wn(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  atbase(c3, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  atnle(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cple, c0), c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
}

thm atnem0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1 ≠ c3 ↔(c1[c4]c3)= c5))
  ⊣ c4 =(meet ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(0. ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Atoms ` c0)
} = {
  bitr3d((c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1 ≠ c3, (c1[c4]c3)= c5, ¬ c1[(le ` c0)]c3)
  atncmp(c0, c1, c2, c3, (le ` c0))
  syl3an3(c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (¬ c1[(le ` c0)]c3 ↔(c1[c4]c3)= c5), c3 ∈(Base ` c0))
  atbase(c3, c2, (Base ` c0), c0)
  atnle(c0, c1, c2, c3, (Base ` c0), (le ` c0), c4, c5)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
}

blocks.name: atlatmstc
blocks.content: An atomic, complete, orthomodular lattice is atomistic i.e. every element is the join of the atoms under it. See remark before Proposition 1 in [Kalmbach] p. 140; also remark in [BeltramettiCassinelli] p. 98. ( ~ hatomistici analog.) (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(catm, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)

  mp2and(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))), c1), wbr(cfv(c3, crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))), c5, c1), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmee, c0), cfv(cfv(coc, c0), cfv(c3, crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))))), cfv(cp0, c0)))
  breqtrd(cfv(c3, crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))), c5, c1, cfv(c3, crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(cfv(c3, crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))), c5, cfv(c3, crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)))), wcel(c0, ccla))
  mp3an23(wcel(c0, ccla), wbr(cfv(c3, crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))), c5, cfv(c3, crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)))), wss(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), c2), wss(crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))))
  ssrab2(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))
  ax-mp(wss(crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))), wss(c4, c2))
  rabss2(s0, c4, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))
  lubss(c0, crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), c2, crab(s0, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1)), c3, c5)
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c5, c1))), c1), wcel(c0, cpo))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c0, cpo))
  atlpos(c0)
  lubid(s0, c3, c2, c5, c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2))

blocks.name: atlatle
blocks.content: The ordering of two Hilbert lattice elements is determined by the atoms under them. ( ~ chrelat3 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(catm, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  impbid(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wral(s0, c5, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3))))

  syl13anc(wa(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1), wbr(c1, c4, c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3)), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))

  sylibd(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(crab(s0, c5, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)), crab(s0, c5, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3))), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(cfv(cfv(club, c0), crab(s0, c5, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))), c4, cfv(cfv(club, c0), crab(s0, c5, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3)))))

  sylancom(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(crab(s0, c5, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)), crab(s0, c5, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3))), wbr(cfv(cfv(club, c0), crab(s0, c5, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))), c4, cfv(cfv(club, c0), crab(s0, c5, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3)))), wcel(c0, ccla))

thm atlatle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(s0[c4]c1 → s0[c4]c3))))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(Atoms ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  impbid(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(s0[c4]c1 → s0[c4]c3)))
  ralrimdva(s0, c5, ((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, (s0[c4]c1 → s0[c4]c3))
  expcomd((((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧ s0 ∈ c5), c1[c4]c3, s0[c4]c1, s0[c4]c3)
  syl13anc((((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧ s0 ∈ c5), ((s0[c4]c1 ∧ c1[c4]c3)→ s0[c4]c3), c0 ∈ Poset, s0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  syl((((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧ s0 ∈ c5), c0 ∈ Poset, c0 ∈ AtLat)
  simpl13(c0 ∈ OML, c0 ∈ CLat, c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c5)
  atlpos(c0)
  adantl(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), s0 ∈ c5, s0 ∈ c2)
  atbase(s0, c5, c2, c0)
  simpl2((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c5)
  simpl3((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c5)
  postr(c0, s0, c2, c1, c3, c4)
  syl5bir(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(s0[c4]c1 → s0[c4]c3)), c1[c4]c3, { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 })
  ss2rab(s0, c5, s0[c4]c1, s0[c4]c3)
  sylibd(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }, c1[c4]c3, ((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 })[c4]((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }))
  ex(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }, ((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 })[c4]((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }))
  sylancom(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }, ((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 })[c4]((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }), c0 ∈ CLat)
  simpl12(c0 ∈ OML, c0 ∈ CLat, c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 })
  mp3an2(c0 ∈ CLat, { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }, ((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 })[c4]((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }), { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 } ⊆ c2)
  sstri({ s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }, c2, c5)
  ssrab2(s0, c5, s0[c4]c3)
  atssbase(c5, c2, c0)
  lubss(c0, { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }, c2, { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 }, (lub ` c0), c4)
  breq12d(((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 }), c4, ((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 }), c1, c3, ((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3adant3((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, ((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c1 })= c1)
  atlatmstc(s0, c0, c1, c2, (lub ` c0), c5, c4)
  3adant2((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, ((lub ` c0)` { s0 ∈ c5 | s0[c4]c3 })= c3)
  atlatmstc(s0, c0, c3, c2, (lub ` c0), c5, c4)
  eqid((lub ` c0))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, (c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, c0 ∈ OML, c0 ∈ CLat, c0 ∈ AtLat)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, coml)
  diff.coml.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ccla)
  diff.ccla.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cal)
  diff.cal.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c2)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c1, c4, c3)

blocks.name: atlrelat1
blocks.content: An atomistic lattice with 0 is relatively atomic. Part of Lemma 7.2 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 30. ( ~ chpssati , with ` /\ ` swapped, analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm atlrelat1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wi(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wrex(s0, c5, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(catm, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  syld(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wrex(s0, c5, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3))), wn(wbr(c3, c6, c1)))
  syld3an1(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c6, c1))), wcel(c0, cpo))
  syl(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c0, cal))
  simp13(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  atlpos(c0)
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c6, c1)))
  pltnle(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6)
  syl6ibr(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wn(wbr(c3, c6, c1)), wrex(s0, c5, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3))), wn(wral(s0, c5, wn(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3))))))
  con3d(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c3, c6, c1), wral(s0, c5, wn(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3)))))
  syl5bir(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wral(s0, c5, wn(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3)))), wbr(c3, c6, c1), wral(s0, c5, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1))))
  ralbii(s0, c5, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wn(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3))))
  xchbinx(wi(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1))))
  iman(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1))
  ancom(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)))
  biimprd(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wral(s0, c5, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1))), wbr(c3, c6, c1))
  3com23(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c0, cal)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wb(wbr(c3, c6, c1), wral(s0, c5, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)))))
  atlatle(s0, c0, c3, c2, c1, c6, c5)
  dfrex2(s0, c5, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c6, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c6, c3)))
}

thm atlrelat1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c5,(¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3))))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(lt ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(Atoms ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  syld(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c5,(¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3)), ¬ c3[c6]c1)
  syld3an1((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c4]c3 → ¬ c3[c6]c1), c0 ∈ Poset)
  syl(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Poset, c0 ∈ AtLat)
  simp13(c0 ∈ OML, c0 ∈ CLat, c0 ∈ AtLat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  atlpos(c0)
  ex((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, ¬ c3[c6]c1)
  pltnle(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6)
  syl6ibr(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ¬ c3[c6]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c5,(¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3)), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ c5, ¬(¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3)))
  con3d(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c3[c6]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c5, ¬(¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3)))
  syl5bir(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c5, ¬(¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3)), c3[c6]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(s0[c6]c3 → s0[c6]c1)))
  ralbii(s0, c5, (s0[c6]c3 → s0[c6]c1), ¬(¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3))
  xchbinx((s0[c6]c3 → s0[c6]c1), (¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3), (s0[c6]c3 ∧ ¬ s0[c6]c1))
  iman(s0[c6]c3, s0[c6]c1)
  ancom(s0[c6]c3, ¬ s0[c6]c1)
  biimprd(((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(s0[c6]c3 → s0[c6]c1)), c3[c6]c1)
  3com23((c0 ∈ OML ∧ c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c0 ∈ AtLat), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c3[c6]c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(s0[c6]c3 → s0[c6]c1))))
  atlatle(s0, c0, c3, c2, c1, c6, c5)
  dfrex2(s0, c5, (¬ s0[c6]c1 ∧ s0[c6]c3))
}

blocks.name: df-cvlat
blocks.content: Define the class of atomic lattices with the covering property. (This is actually the exchange property, but they are equivalent. The literature usually uses the covering property terminology.) (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cvlat(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(clc, crab(s0, cal, wral(s1, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), co(cv(s3), cfv(cjn, cv(s0)), cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), co(cv(s3), cfv(cjn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: iscvlat
blocks.content: The predicate "is an atomic lattice with the covering (or exchange) property". (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscvlat(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, clc), wa(wcel(c0, cal), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s1), c3, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))

thm iscvlat(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CvLat ↔(c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0)))))))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(join ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(Atoms ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CvLat ↔(c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0))))))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CvLat ↔(c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0))))))), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CvLat ↔(c0 ∈ AtLat ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0))))))), d(s2, c2))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, clc, cal, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0))))), ∀(s0 ∈(Atoms ` hs0), ∀(s1 ∈(Atoms ` hs0), ∀(s2 ∈(Base ` hs0),((¬ s0[(le ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s0[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s1))→ s1[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s0))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, (Atoms ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, ∀(s1 ∈(Atoms ` hs0), ∀(s2 ∈(Base ` hs0),((¬ s0[(le ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s0[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s1))→ s1[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s0)))), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, (Atoms ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, ∀(s2 ∈(Base ` hs0),((¬ s0[(le ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s0[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s1))→ s1[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s0))), ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0))))
  syl6eqr((Atoms ` hs0), c1, (Atoms ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, catm)
  raleqbidv(s2, (Base ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0, ((¬ s0[(le ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s0[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s1))→ s1[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s0)), ((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0)))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, (¬ s0[(le ` hs0)]s2 ∧ s0[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s1)), s1[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s0), (¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1)), s1[c3](s2[c4]s0))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, ¬ s0[(le ` hs0)]s2, s0[(le ` hs0)](s2[(join ` hs0)]s1), ¬ s0[c3]s2, s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))
  notbid(hs0 = c0, s0[(le ` hs0)]s2, s0[c3]s2)
  breqd(s0, (le ` hs0), s2, c3, hs0 = c0)
  breq123d(s0, (le ` hs0), (s2[(join ` hs0)]s1), s0, c3, (s2[c4]s1), hs0 = c0)
  eqidd(s0, hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s2, (join ` hs0), s1, c4, hs0 = c0)
  breq123d(s1, (le ` hs0), (s2[(join ` hs0)]s0), s1, c3, (s2[c4]s0), hs0 = c0)
  eqidd(s1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((le ` hs0), c3, (le ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cple)
  oveqd(s2, (join ` hs0), s0, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((join ` hs0), c4, (join ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cjn)
  df-cvlat(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cal)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((¬ s0[c3]s2 ∧ s0[c3](s2[c4]s1))→ s1[c3](s2[c4]s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))

  bitri(wcel(c0, clc), wa(wcel(c0, cal), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), c4), wbr(cv(s0), c5, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s1), c5, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s0)))))))), wa(wcel(c0, cal), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c5, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s1), c5, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s0)))))))))

  2ralbidva(s0, s1, c1, c1, wcel(c0, cal), wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c5, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s1), c5, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s0))))), wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), c4), wbr(cv(s0), c5, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s1), c5, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s0))))))

blocks.name: cvlsupr3
blocks.content: Two equivalent ways of expressing that ` R ` is a superposition of ` P ` and ` Q ` , which can replace the superposition part of ~ ishlat1 , ` ( x =/= y -> E. z e. A ( z =/= x /\ z =/= y /\ z .<_ ( x .\/ y ) ) ` ` ) ` , with the simpler ` E. z e. A ( x .\/ z ) = ( y .\/ z ) ` as shown in ~ ishlat3N . (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
